content: Hey, can you help me? I've started a blog, hot links to unapproved sites are not authorized on blogger.com. It's a purpose-driven, moderated blog where active duty or veterans can present stories of being injured/ill in the service and being abused or neglected by the military medical or by their supervisors, leading to long-term or permanent harm or disability. Also for suggestions of possible solutions to this common problem. Not a site for complaining, it's intended to raise awareness - hopefully, eventually - by senior military, who are the only ones who can bring about change. Now, I don't know where to put this blog. I looked through the list of topics and it didn't seem to fit anywhere. Could you lend a shipmate a hand? Thanks! P.S. The threads seem to be awfully repetitive, quotes and requotes. Hard for me to moderate. Could some general note be put, hey, check out this blog, it's a topic affecting all of us? (And not highly controversial, like some here.) This message has been edited.
